parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID

parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.
parameters.name: X-Avi-Version

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: UpgradeStatusSummary object creation
parameters.name: body

parameters.description: object name
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid
parameters.name: refers_to

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid
parameters.name: referred_by

parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: Default values are not set.
parameters.name: skip_default

parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.
parameters.name: join_subresources

reason.description: Descriptive reason for the state-change. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

state.description: The upgrade operations current fsm-state. Enum options - UPGRADE_FSM_INIT, UPGRADE_FSM_STARTED, UPGRADE_FSM_WAITING, UPGRADE_FSM_IN_PROGRESS, UPGRADE_FSM_ENQUEUED, UPGRADE_FSM_ERROR, UPGRADE_FSM_SUSPENDED, UPGRADE_FSM_ENQUEUE_FAILED, UPGRADE_FSM_CONTROLLER_COMPLETED, UPGRADE_FSM_COMPLETED, UPGRADE_FSM_ABORT_IN_PROGRESS, UPGRADE_FSM_ABORTED. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

last_changed_time.description: The last time the state changed. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

enable_patch_rollback.description: Check if the patch rollback is possible on this node. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

start_time.description: Start time of upgrade operations. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

upgrade_ops.description: Upgrade operations requested. Enum options - UPGRADE, PATCH, ROLLBACK, ROLLBACKPATCH, SEGROUP_RESUME. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

node_type.description: Type of the system such as controller_cluster, se_group or se. Enum options - NODE_CONTROLLER_CLUSTER, NODE_SE_GROUP, NODE_SE_TYPE. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

obj_cloud_ref.description: Cloud that this object belongs to. It is a reference to an object of type Cloud. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

patch_image_ref.description: Image uuid for identifying the current patch. It is a reference to an object of type Image. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

total_tasks.description: Total upgrade tasks. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

_last_modified.description: UNIX time since epoch in microseconds. Units(MICROSECONDS).

enable_rollback.description: Check if the rollback is possible on this node. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

uuid.description: UUID Identifier for the system such as cluster, se group and se. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

tenant_ref.description: Tenant that this object belongs to. It is a reference to an object of type Tenant. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

name.description: Name of the system such as cluster name, se group name and se name. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

state.description: Current status of the upgrade operations. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

version.description: Current base image applied to this node. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

image_ref.description: Image uuid for identifying the current base image. It is a reference to an object of type Image. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

end_time.description: End time of upgrade operations. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

tasks_completed.description: Upgrade tasks completed. Field introduced in 18.2.6.
